title: Facebook’s Libra Association adds crypto prime broker Tagomi
text: $28 million-funded crypto startup Tagomi will be the newest member of the Libra Association that governs the Facebook-backed Libra stablecoin, TechCrunch has learned.

title: Facebook’s evolving status: From apologetic to defiant
text: Mark Zuckerberg’s change in status from apologetic to defiant has been slowly morphing before our eyes and ears for some time.

title: Here's How Much Your Privacy on Facebook Is Worth

title: Facebook's Growth Is Slowing Down, Yet the Stock Has Never Looked Like a Better Value
text: Facebook stock recently took a 10% haircut after earnings. With a cloud over the company's future, investors have an opportunity to snap up shares at a solid valuation.

title: Facebook bans ads that promise to prevent or cure the coronavirus
text:
Facebook’s ban on ads that promise to prevent or cure the coronavirus comes four weeks after the company said it would start to remove content with conspiracy theories or false claims about the virus.
As the COVID-19 coronavirus continues its spread around the globe, Facebook has announced that is it banning ads on its platform that make claims promising to prevent or cure the disease, reports Business Insider.
